title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: IndiGG, India's largest gaming guild recently announced their latest partnership with Myria, a Layer 2 scaling solution. It combines a gaming platform with applications, tools and scaling infrastructure needed to bring blockchain gaming to life. They bring together everything that is required to build a decentralized, scalable and secure digital asset and blockchain gaming platform.With Myria, IndiGG will provide scalability to their rapidly growing gaming ecosystem, taking them to new heights and providing an even better gaming experience for their players.Learn more about this partnership here: https://medium.com/@IndiGG/indigg-to-become-a-powerhouse-in-the-gaming-industry-with-myrias-layer-2-scaling-solutions-196835c8161c
